title: Yamikani Chester
text:
Yamikani Chester (born 20 December 1994) is a Malawian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays as a <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">winger</a>.
He represented the Malawi U20s at the <a href="2011%20COSAFA%20U-20%20Cup">2011 COSAFA U-20 Cup</a>.
Chester played for <a href="North%20Carolina%20FC">North Carolina FC</a> in 2019, while on loan from <a href="MFK%20Vy%C5%A1kov">MFK Vyškov</a>.
In December 2019, Chester joined <a href="Las%20Vegas%20Lights%20FC">Las Vegas Lights FC</a> of the USL Championship.
